name: IIM JOBS
description: Number One Senior Management Jobs Site
overview:
Founded in 2004 by IIMA Alumni, IIM JOBS was created with one Goal in mind: To provide a Confidential Job Search Forum for Middle & Senior Management Professionals. IIM JOBS is the Largest Online Community (In India) of Senior Management Professionals, with Proven Commitment to Providing Quality, Service and Integrity. IIM JOBS helps connect the Top 5 % of Jobs with the Top 1 % of Job seekers across all Sectors and Managerial Functions.

How does it work?

Middle & Senior Management Professionals, who are looking for a new Job, or simply want to keep an eye on the job market, register (FREE) to become a member of IIM JOBS Site. IIM JOBS offer our Members, the Opportunity to Search and Apply for hundreds of High-Quality Opportunities. (AND YES, IT IS FREE). Recruiters can view the Job Seeking Professional’s Details, only once the Job Seeking Professional share their Profile to the Recruiter (In reply to a Job Posting), thereby ensuring 100 % Confidentiality in the Search. Job Seeking Professionals can rate the Recruiters each time they interact with them, and Recruiters with low rating would be eventually barred from posting Job Adverts. To register with IIM JOBS as a Member, please click the â€˜Candidate Sign Upâ€™

Employers, who are looking for Mid to Senior Management Professionals, complete the “Post Job” Template and Post their Job Adverts on the site. Employer advertisers has to mandatorily keep their Employer Profile updated, as our Senior Management Professionals would make an informed decision about an Employer Company, its values & the offering, & the Rating of the Employer, before they submit a job application. Once a Job Ad has been published, Job seeking Professionals can view and apply for it. Many Job seeking Professionals opt for Sector / Function Digests as it notifies them automatically when jobs, in the Sector/ Function of their interest, are listed on the IIM JOBS site.

Our Application Filter System ensures that only the Job seeking Professionals who Qualify all the 3 â€œMust haveâ€ Job Specific Filter Requirements (or defined Minimum number of Job Filters) defined for each Job (Filter Example: - Candidate should have minimum 7 Yrs Exp, Candidate should be from Top 20 B School, Candidate should be Ready to relocate to Mumbai or NCR), can only apply for the Specific Job. Link of the Jobs posted in IIM Jobs website would be circulated in IIM Jobs Yahoo group (22000 Plus Members), IIM Jobs Linkedin Group (11000 Plus Members) and many other IIM networking forums, to ensure that the Recruiter get Limited, Targeted response. To register as an Employer, please click the â€˜Recruiter Sign up’
